Pin proxy (so multiple processes can access/control it simultaneously).

should be implemented to prevent rapid switching.

repo_list.description: Ready-to-go Erlang on the BeagleBone
A new tab page for chrome that displays timezones that matter to you.
A hacktastic script to extract ADSL stats out of a Netgear DGN1000 modem/router
Collection of configuration files
A concise reference for Erlang
A simple demo showcasing Erlang bit syntax used in handling protocols
Erlang Actor Library for Embedded -- An embedded framework from Erlang Solutions
Utility functions for Erlang ports
A simple Wordpress plugin to enable Fancybox on image links
a quick hack to locate headless embedded boards on the network
:symbols: A collection of GitHub issue and pull request templates
A simple cross-platform CLI IP scanner
Nice, downward compatible, touchable, jQuery dial
testing kivy framework
Custom Character Generator for HD44780 LCD Modules
Little Wire is multi-featured USB controlled open source hardware tool packed in a minimal form factor designed by ihsan Kehribar.
A simple C# GUI for batch conversion of FLAC/OGG files to (lossy) MP3s.
Mongoose web server
Beer, cheese and NFC spirographs.
collection of occam-pi experiments on Raspberry Pi
A minimal serial terminal emulator
An experiment with Open Sound Control and RPi hardware
Erlang/OTP
A simple feedback utility for talks and such
PHP client for the Hackathon Gunther Daemon.
lightweight C wrappers for Raspberry Pi hardware modules

Python interface for the Firmata (http://firmata.org/) protocol. It is compliant with Firmata 2.1. Any help with updating to 2.2 is welcome. The Capability Query is implemented, but the Pin State Query feature not yet.
Python API for controlling GPIO and I2C devices connected to the Raspberry Pi
A very simple Spotify "remote" using flask and xdotool
Collection of tools to manage Teensy boards
An evaluation kit for VoCore, the coin-sized Linux computer with WiFi.
A replacement controller hack for Yo!Bot
